explains: vt. 强迫；恫吓；用推土机清除

sentences.en: She defeated developers who wanted to bulldoze her home to build a supermarket.
sentences.cn: 她打败了那些企图推倒她的家园建造超市的开发商。

sentences.en: Dropping all pretense of reason, they began to bulldoze through the democratic reforms.
sentences.cn: 他们抛开一切佯装的理性，开始胁迫进行民主改革。

sentences.en: They bulldoze him into signing the contract.
sentences.cn: 他们强行使他签署这个契约。
